cont.entity_a: Stopped working in less than a year and is problematic in low light.
cont.entity_b: Isn't supported on Nikon D5600; requires AF-S for autofocus.

cont.entity_a: Warranty service was complicated due to unauthorized seller status. Tamron warranty repair service is efficient, though shipping costs are the user's responsibility. Warranty process is obtuse and cumbersome. Solid construction with a nice USA 6-year warranty.
Lens is a workhorse with a telephoto macro function. Solid and built well. Built with a lot of plastic on the inner workings, prone to breaking. Lens is lightweight and easy to use.
cont.entity_b: Lens is an incredible asset for photo quality. Insanely sharp with great bokeh and built like a tank. Plastic build with loose tolerances but good optical performance. Great value for the price with a compact build.

cont.entity_a: Lens is solid and built well; good picture quality. Focal ring is loose, causing lens creep when pointed upward.
cont.entity_b: Lightweight but feels fragile due to plastic build.

cont.entity_a: Pictures are generally soft with noticeable chromatic aberration. Good quality pictures, but needs stabilization for low light conditions.
cont.entity_b: Produces beautiful photos but can result in minor sun flares. Sharp photos, but lens can fit loosely on some cameras.

cont.entity_a: Manual focus works fine. Autofocus takes a long time and lack of image stabilization affects photo usability.
cont.entity_b: Manual operation needed for cameras without a focusing motor. Manual focus required on entry-level bodies.

cont.entity_a: No stabilization, but still delivers good pictures.
Lens is a good bargain with great picture clarity for the price. Good lens for the money, especially for outdoor use.
cont.entity_b: Great value for the price with a compact build.

cont.entity_a: Lens is a workhorse with a telephoto macro function. Macro setting is great for close-ups.
Lens is noisy and slow, not suitable for astrophotography. Motor is loud and distortion can be unpredictable.
cont.entity_b: AF is a bit slow and noisy but works well.

cont.entity_a: Solid construction with a nice USA 6-year warranty.

cont.entity_b: Not compatible with Nikon D3400 despite description.

cont.entity_a: Autofocus is problematic in low light; manual focus is recommended.
cont.entity_b: Great lens for low light situations with crystal clear images.
